#summary GPS guided catamarane.

= Introduction =

This wiki acompanies the Chapter 9 ofthe APRESS Book "Arduino Robotics", which focusses on the construction of a GPS guided catamaran model boat. Actually, in download section you can find the source of the firmware, that runs on a modified ArduPilot Hardware. Yo can also find there a PDF file with the cross-section drawings that are used to build the floats of the catamarane.
Feel free to comment  with your own experiences and questions
